thread.title: Indianapolis Colts at Houston Texans (Thursday Night Football): Start time, what TV channel, how to watch live stream online
thread.title_full: Indianapolis Colts at Houston Texans (Thursday Night Football): Start time, what TV channel, how to watch live stream online | OregonLive.com

author: Geoffrey C. Arnold | The Oregonian/OregonLive
title: Indianapolis Colts at Houston Texans (Thursday Night Football): Start time, what TV channel, how to watch live stream online
text:
UPDATE : We have live updates and the latest score from the Colts-Texans game . Join us in the live chat for the latest news form the game.
The Indianapolis Colts managed to defeat Jacksonville without star quarterback Andrew Luck in Week 4, but it's not a situation they would prefer to continue. They may not have a choice, because Luck isn't expect to be in the lineup when they play at Houston on Thursday Night Football (5:30 p.m. PT/8:30 p.m. ET, KOIN-6 (CBS), NFL Network) .
Luck is nursing an injured shoulder and isn't likely to play. If he can't play, the Colts will again turn to 40-year-old backup Matt Hasselbeck.
Houston coach Bill O'Brien says Ryan Mallett will start at quarterback against the Colts. Mallett completed 12 of 27 passes for 150 yards with a passer rating of 46.8 before being benched in the loss against Atlanta. Mallett is on a very short leash and O'Brien will use the hook much faster is Mallett gets off to another poor start.
If you're looking to watch the Colts face the Texans, here's what you need to know.
What : Indianapolis Colts at Houston Texans
Where : NRG Stadium, Houston Texas
When : Thursday, Oct. 8, 5:30 p.m PT/8:30 p.m. ET
TV : KOIN-6 (CBS), NFL Network
Watch online : You can watch a live stream online on DirecTV's live stream package.
-- Geoffrey C. Arnold | @geoffreyCarnold
More: Thursday Night Football Preview
